LanguageData.TheRichExplorer.label: Varlıklı Gezgin
LanguageData.TheRichExplorer.description: İnsanlar, parıltılı bir yaşam sürdüğünüz evinizi terk ettiğiniz için sizin deli olduğunuzu düşünüyordu, ama siz her zaman nöro simülatörün dışında - yıldızları keşfetmek istemiştiniz. Ama şimdi uyku kapsülünde geçen uzun bir yolculuğun sonundasınız, neye benzedğini görmek için bilinmeyen bir gezegene, Rimworld' a iniyorsunuz.
LanguageData.TheRichExplorer.scenario.name: The Rich Explorer
LanguageData.TheRichExplorer.scenario.description: People called you crazy for leaving your glitterworld home, but you always yearned to explore the stars - outside the neurosimulator. Now you're at the end of your long journey in cryptosleep, landing on an unknown rimworld to see what it's like.
LanguageData.TheRichExplorer.scenario.summary: One rich explorer out to experience the universet.
LanguageData.TheRichExplorer.scenario.parts.12.text: The neurosimulations, holo-games, and free-orgies were never enough for you. You wanted more - the grit and consequence of real life, like they talk about in the history books. You wanted to know what real challenge and consequence feel like.\n\nNow, after a journey of decades in cryptosleep, you're landing on this unknown rimworld. Real consequences await you.
LanguageData.LostTribe.label: Lost Tribe
LanguageData.LostTribe.description: Your tribe was destroyed by the great blood machines sent by the gods. Five of you managed to escape. Now, it's time to build up a new home.
LanguageData.LostTribe.scenario.name: Lost Tribe
LanguageData.LostTribe.scenario.description: Your tribe was destroyed by the great blood machines sent by the gods. Five of you managed to escape. Now, it's time to build up a new home.
LanguageData.LostTribe.scenario.summary: Five lost tribespeople attempt to rebuild.
LanguageData.LostTribe.scenario.parts.13.text: The gods were very angry. The blood machines came at night. They swept through your village, cutting and burning your people with their blades and devil-fire.\n\nOnly a few of you escaped. Now, after a harrowing journey on foot, with no close friends to turn to, you must build a new home in the wilderness, like your ancestors did..
